emergencyPause().details: Emergency function to pause all operations

emergencyUpdateContracts(address,address.details: Emergency function to update contract addresses

returns.agentRegistryAddr: Address of the agent registry contract
returns.multiSigWalletAddr: Address of the multi-sig wallet contract

returns._0: platformId The platform ID if found, 0 if not found

getUserPlatformSummary(address).details: Get platform summary for a user

returns.totalAgents: Total number of agents across all platforms
returns.totalCredentials: Total number of credentials across all platforms
returns.totalPlatforms: Total number of platforms owned by the user
returns.totalTransactions: Total number of transactions across all platforms

getUserPlatforms(address).details: Get all platforms for a user

params._agentRegistry: Address of the agent registry contract
params._multiSigWallet: Address of the multi-sig wallet contract

returns._0: True if all contracts are initialized

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
